title: Bug 101187: Error when adding localization key
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding. 

Description: When the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value.

Observed behavior: The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.

Expected behavior: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
OB: The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value.
3. Verify that the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
